modules.title: Linux Operations & Command Line (The OS of the web)
Report Writing for Executives (Turning intel into value)
Stress Management & Resilience (Essential for SOC burnout)
Report Writing for Executives (The most important pentest skill)

technical.title: ISO 27001 Standards & Implementation
technical.goal: Understanding the global gold standard for InfoSec.
technical.concepts: ISMS (Information Security Management System). PDCA Cycle. Annex A Controls. Policy writing.
technical.skills: Drafting security policies. Preparing for external certification audits.

technical.title: NIST Cybersecurity Framework
technical.goal: Adopting the US standard for critical infrastructure protection.
technical.concepts: The 5 Functions (Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond, Recover). NIST SP 800-53. Tier levels.
technical.tools: NIST CSF Excel Tool, DHS CSET.
technical.skills: Mapping controls to risks. Performing a gap analysis against NIST.

technical.title: Risk Management Strategies
technical.concepts: Risk Appetite vs. Tolerance. Qualitative vs. Quantitative Analysis. SLE/ALE. Risk Registers.
technical.skills: Calculating financial risk. Prioritizing security investments based on ROI.

technical.title: Internal Auditing Procedures
technical.goal: Verifying that controls are actually working.
technical.concepts: Audit Scope. Evidence Collection. Sampling. Reporting findings. Independence.
technical.skills: Conducting stakeholder interviews. verifying technical controls. Writing audit reports.

technical.title: Third-Party Risk Management (TPRM)
technical.goal: Managing the risk of vendors and supply chains.
technical.concepts: Vendor Due Diligence. SIG/CAIQ Questionnaires. SLAs. Right to Audit clauses.
technical.skills: Evaluating vendor security posture. Negotiating security clauses in contracts.

technical.title: Cyber Warfare Tactics
technical.goal: Understanding the strategic landscape of nation-state conflict.
technical.concepts: APTs (Advanced Persistent Threats). Critical Infrastructure targets. Disinformation. Cyber Espionage.
technical.skills: Profiling nation-state actors. Understanding strategic cyber capabilities.

technical.title: Geopolitical Risk Analysis
technical.goal: analyzing how global events impact cyber threat levels.
technical.concepts: Regional threat actors (Russia, China, etc.). Attribution problems. Sanctions and cyber response.
technical.skills: Producing strategic threat briefings. Anticipating attacks based on world news.

technical.title: CI/CD Pipeline Security
technical.goal: Integrating security into the DevOps lifecycle (Shift Left).
technical.concepts: The DevOps Loop. Automated Security Gates. Supply Chain Security. Artifact integrity.
technical.tools: Jenkins, GitLab CI, OWASP Dependency Check.
technical.skills: Building secure pipelines. Automating vulnerability scans on commit.

technical.title: API Security Testing
technical.goal: Securing the connective tissue of modern apps.
technical.concepts: REST vs GraphQL. OWASP API Top 10. BOLA/IDOR. Rate Limiting. JWT Attacks.
technical.skills: Testing API endpoints. Manipulating JSON tokens. Identifying logic flaws in APIs.

technical.title: AI for Defense (SOC Automation)
technical.goal: Leveraging AI to fight scale with scale.
technical.concepts: Anomaly Detection. UEBA (User Entity Behavior Analytics). Supervised vs. Unsupervised Learning.
technical.skills: Configuring AI-driven alerts. Reducing false positives using ML.

technical.title: Blockchain Security
technical.skills: analyzing blockchain transactions. Securing digital wallets.

technical.title: Adversarial AI (Attacking Models)
technical.goal: Understanding how to trick Artificial Intelligence.
technical.concepts: Data Poisoning. Model Inversion. Evasion Attacks. Black Box vs White Box attacks.
technical.skills: Testing AI models for robustness. Understanding model vulnerabilities.

technical.title: Smart Contract Auditing
technical.goal: Finding money-losing bugs in decentralized code.
technical.concepts: Reentrancy Attacks. Integer Overflows. Flash Loans. Gas Optimization.
technical.skills: Auditing Solidity code. Identifying logic flaws in contracts.

technical.title: LLM Security (Prompt Injection Defense)
technical.goal: Securing the new wave of Generative AI applications.
technical.concepts: Prompt Injection (Jailbreaking). Data Leakage. OWASP Top 10 for LLMs.
technical.skills: Auditing LLM prompts. Preventing sensitive data exfiltration via AI.

technical.title: IoT Security Fundamentals
technical.concepts: Edge Computing. MQTT/CoAP. Firmware security. Botnets (Mirai).
technical.skills: Extracting firmware. analyzing IoT network traffic.

technical.title: Quantum Cryptography Basics
technical.concepts: Qubits. Shor’s Algorithm. Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC). QKD.
technical.skills: Understanding the threat to RSA/ECC. Identifying crypto-agility needs.

technical.title: OT & SCADA Security
technical.concepts: Purdue Model. PLCs & HMIs. Air Gapping. Modbus/DNP3.
technical.skills: Understanding industrial protocols. Recognizing safety system risks.

soft_skills.title: Resume Building & Optimization
soft_skills.goal: Creating a CV that passes the robots (ATS) and impresses humans.
soft_skills.concepts: ATS Logic. Keyword optimization. Action Verbs. Result-oriented bullets.
soft_skills.skills: Writing an ATS-compliant resume. Structuring technical experience effectively.

soft_skills.title: Public Speaking
soft_skills.concepts: Body language. Voice modulation. Story arcs. Handling Q&A.
soft_skills.skills: Overcoming stage fright. Presenting to groups.

soft_skills.title: Interview Preparation & Mock Sessions
soft_skills.goal: Mastering the art of the interview.
soft_skills.concepts: STAR Method (Behavioral). Whiteboard coding logic. Salary negotiation basics.
soft_skills.skills: Answering "Tell me about yourself" confidently. Handling technical grilling.

soft_skills.title: Presentation Design (PowerPoint/Canva)
soft_skills.goal: Creating slides that inform, not bore.
soft_skills.concepts: Visual Hierarchy. Data Viz best practices. "Death by PowerPoint" avoidance.
soft_skills.skills: Designing clean, professional decks. Summarizing complex data.

soft_skills.title: Personal Branding Strategy
soft_skills.goal: Establishing a professional reputation in the industry.
soft_skills.concepts: Niche definition. Content strategy. Authority building. Consistency.
soft_skills.skills: creating technical content. Building an audience.

soft_skills.title: Storytelling with Data
soft_skills.concepts: Narrative structure. Choosing correct charts. Guiding attention.

soft_skills.title: LinkedIn Growth & Optimization
soft_skills.goal: Turning a profile into an inbound lead generator.
soft_skills.concepts: SEO for Profiles. Headline engineering. Social Selling Index (SSI).
soft_skills.skills: Creating an "All-Star" profile. Networking with recruiters.

soft_skills.title: Technical Writing (SOPs/Documentation)
soft_skills.concepts: Audience analysis. SOP structure. Conciseness. API Docs.
soft_skills.skills: Writing Standard Operating Procedures. Documenting code.

soft_skills.title: Portfolio Development
soft_skills.concepts: Documentation standards. GitHub structure. CTF Write-ups.
soft_skills.skills: Showcasing code and projects. Writing technical guides.

soft_skills.title: Report Writing for Executives
soft_skills.goal: Translating tech risk into business language.
soft_skills.concepts: BLUF (Bottom Line Up Front). Executive Summaries. Risk Impact Matrices.
soft_skills.skills: Writing pentest executive summaries. Justifying budgets.

soft_skills.title: Professional Networking Strategies
soft_skills.concepts: Weak Ties theory. Informational Interviews. Cold outreach etiquette.

soft_skills.title: Email Etiquette & Corporate Messaging
soft_skills.concepts: Tone. Clarity. Call to Action. Reply All etiquette.

soft_skills.title: Cross-Cultural Communication
soft_skills.concepts: High vs. Low Context. Feedback styles. Time perception.
soft_skills.skills: Navigating cultural differences in remote teams.

soft_skills.title: Negotiation Skills
soft_skills.goal: Getting what you want without burning bridges.
soft_skills.concepts: BATNA. Win-Win strategies. Anchoring.

soft_skills.title: Persuasion & Influence
soft_skills.concepts: Cialdini’s 6 Principles. Stakeholder Management.

soft_skills.title: Critical Thinking
soft_skills.concepts: First Principles. Socratic Method. Correlation vs. Causation.

soft_skills.title: Time Management & Productivity
soft_skills.concepts: Pomodoro. Eisenhower Matrix. Deep Work.

soft_skills.title: Analytical Problem Solving
soft_skills.concepts: Root Cause Analysis. 5 Whys. Fishbone Diagrams.
soft_skills.skills: Debugging complex failures. finding root causes.

soft_skills.title: Agile Methodologies (Scrum/Kanban)
soft_skills.goal: Working at the speed of modern dev.
soft_skills.concepts: Scrum. Kanban. Sprints. User Stories.
soft_skills.skills: Participating in stand-ups. Working in sprints.

soft_skills.title: Strategic Decision Making
soft_skills.concepts: OODA Loop. Decision Trees. Risk-based choices.
soft_skills.skills: Making fast, accurate decisions in a crisis.

soft_skills.title: Project Management Basics
soft_skills.goal: Delivering projects on time and budget.
soft_skills.concepts: Scope. Timeline. Critical Path. Gantt Charts.

soft_skills.title: Cognitive Biases & Fallacies
soft_skills.concepts: Confirmation Bias. Sunk Cost. Availability Heuristic. Dunning-Kruger.

soft_skills.title: Business Acumen for Tech Pros
soft_skills.concepts: ROI. EBITDA. Profit & Loss. Strategic alignment.

soft_skills.title: Systems Thinking
soft_skills.concepts: Feedback loops. Second-order effects. Holistic views.
soft_skills.skills: Understanding how changes affect the whole ecosystem.

soft_skills.title: Financial Literacy (Budgets/ROI)
soft_skills.concepts: CAPEX vs OPEX. ROSI (Return on Security Investment).

soft_skills.title: Creative Innovation
soft_skills.concepts: Lateral Thinking. SCAMPER. Divergent thinking.

soft_skills.title: Change Management
soft_skills.concepts: ADKAR Model. Resistance management. Communication planning.

soft_skills.title: Crisis Management
soft_skills.concepts: Incident Command System (ICS). Reputation management.

soft_skills.title: Emotional Intelligence (EQ)
soft_skills.concepts: Self-Awareness. Self-Regulation. Empathy. Social Skills.

soft_skills.title: Stress Management & Resilience
soft_skills.concepts: Burnout recognition. Detachment. Boundaries.

soft_skills.title: Empathy in the Workplace
soft_skills.concepts: Cognitive vs Emotional Empathy. Psychological Safety.

soft_skills.title: Leadership Fundamentals
soft_skills.concepts: Servant Leadership. Delegation. Feedback loops.

soft_skills.title: Conflict Resolution
soft_skills.concepts: Active Listening. De-escalation. Mediation.

soft_skills.title: Mentorship Skills
soft_skills.concepts: Mentor-Mentee lifecycle. Socratic questioning.

soft_skills.title: Team Collaboration Dynamics
soft_skills.concepts: Psychological Safety. Remote etiquette.

soft_skills.title: Workplace Ethics & Integrity
soft_skills.concepts: Code of Conduct. Whistleblowing. Grey areas.

workshops.title: The Bug Bounty Hunter
workshops.mission: Find and report valid vulnerabilities in a practice banking application.
workshops.outcome: A submitted vulnerability report and a "Hall of Fame" entry.

workshops.title: The SOC War Room
workshops.mission: Survive a "Hell Week" simulation of continuous alerts, separating false positives from real attacks.
workshops.outcome: Handing over a shift report and successfully blocking an active intrusion.

workshops.title: Cloud Sentinel Bootcamp
workshops.mission: Secure a leaky AWS/Azure environment that has been misconfigured.
workshops.outcome: A hardened cloud architecture with automated security alerts.

workshops.title: The OSINT Detective
workshops.mission: Track a "missing person" (fictional target) across the clear and dark web.
workshops.outcome: A comprehensive Intelligence Dossier on the target.

workshops.title: Python for Cyber Automation
workshops.mission: "Stop doing it manually." Write scripts to automate boring reconnaissance tasks.
workshops.outcome: A custom-built, working Port Scanner or Brute-force tool hosted on GitHub.

workshops.title: GRC & Audit Masterclass
workshops.mission: Audit a fictional company that is failing compliance and fix their mess.

soft_mods.title: Negotiation Skills (Convincing management to spend money)

workshops.outcome: An Audit Finding Report and a Remediation Roadmap.

workshops.title: Red Team Operator
workshops.mission: Breach a corporate network starting from a phishing email to Domain Admin.
workshops.outcome: A complete "Kill Chain" execution and debrief presentation.

workshops.title: The Career Launchpad
workshops.mission: Get hired. (This is a non-technical, pure career-focused workshop).
workshops.outcome: A finalized Resume, Cover Letter, LinkedIn Profile, and Mock Interview recording.

workshops.title: Digital Forensics Investigator
workshops.mission: Analyze a seized hard drive to find evidence of corporate espionage.
workshops.outcome: A Forensic Investigation Report admissible in "court."

workshops.title: AI-Powered Security
workshops.mission: Build a defense system using AI and then try to trick it.
workshops.outcome: A functioning "AI Defense Agent" and a report on its blind spots.

workshops.title: API & AppSec Defender
workshops.mission: Take a broken, vulnerable API and rewrite the code to make it secure.
workshops.outcome: A "Before & After" code review showing fixed vulnerabilities.

workshops.title: The CISO Simulation
workshops.mission: Manage a massive cyber crisis while handling the Board of Directors and budget cuts.
workshops.outcome: A Strategic Crisis Response Plan and a Board Presentation.

benefits.title: Progeta Accreditation
benefits.description: Official Certificate of Completion from Progeta Technologies.

benefits.title: Career Boost
benefits.description: Opportunity to receive a Letter of Recommendation (LoR) directly from the company (merit-based).

benefits.title: Technical Proficiency
benefits.description: Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) Frameworks, STIX/TAXII Standards, Malware Analysis, Dark Web Operations.

benefits.title: Professional Skills
benefits.description: Strategic Analysis (Connecting disparately sourced data), Executive Reporting (Synthesizing technical threats into business risk).

benefits.title: Capstone Artifact
benefits.description: A comprehensive Threat Landscape Report documenting a full deep-web investigation on a specific threat actor.

benefits.title: Certification Readiness
benefits.description: Curriculum aligns with CompTIA CySA+ and EC-Council CTIA standards.

benefits.title: Technical Proficiency
benefits.description: SIEM Architecture (Splunk/Wazuh), Network Traffic Analysis, Log Management, Incident Response Lifecycle.

benefits.title: Professional Skills
benefits.description: Crisis Management (Operational calmness under pressure), Process Adherence (Strict following of Standard Operating Procedures).

benefits.title: Capstone Artifact
benefits.description: A custom Incident Response Playbook and a Live Fire Defense Report detailing the mitigation of a simulated ransomware attack.

benefits.title: Certification Readiness
benefits.description: Curriculum aligns with CompTIA Security+ and Cisco CyberOps Associate standards.

benefits.title: Technical Proficiency
benefits.description: Cloud Infrastructure (AWS/Azure), Containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), CI/CD Automation, Python Scripting.

benefits.title: Professional Skills
benefits.description: Cross-Functional Collaboration (Aligning security goals with development speed), Systems Thinking.

benefits.title: Capstone Artifact
benefits.description: A Secure Pipeline Implementation hosted on GitHub, demonstrating automated scanning and cloud hardening.

benefits.title: Credentials
benefits.description: Progeta Diploma in Cloud Security & DevSecOps.

benefits.title: Certification Readiness
benefits.description: Curriculum aligns with AWS Certified Security – Specialty.

benefits.title: Barrier to Entry
benefits.description: High (Requires both coding and infrastructure knowledge)

benefits.title: Technical Proficiency
benefits.description: ISO 27001 Implementation, NIST Framework, Risk Assessment Methodologies, Compliance Auditing.

benefits.title: Professional Skills
benefits.description: Business Acumen (Balancing security costs vs. business risk), Stakeholder Negotiation.

benefits.title: Capstone Artifact
benefits.description: A Corporate Risk Assessment Report and Audit Findings Document based on a complex enterprise case study.

benefits.title: Certification Readiness
benefits.description: Curriculum aligns with ISACA CISA and CRISC standards.

benefits.title: Barrier to Entry
benefits.description: Medium (Requires strong conceptual and legal understanding)

benefits.title: Technical Proficiency
benefits.description: Network & Web Exploitation, Burp Suite Professional, Privilege Escalation, Active Directory Attacks.

benefits.title: Professional Skills
benefits.description: Technical Writing (Structuring professional remediation reports), Ethics & Integrity (Strict adherence to Rules of Engagement).

benefits.title: Capstone Artifact
benefits.description: A professional Penetration Test Report covering Executive Summary, Technical Findings, and Remediation Strategy.

benefits.title: Certification Readiness
benefits.description: Curriculum aligns with OffSec OSCP and EC-Council CEH standards.

benefits.title: Technical Proficiency
benefits.description: Python/Go Programming, API Development, Secure Coding Practices, Software Engineering Principles.

benefits.title: Capstone Artifact
benefits.description: A Custom Security Tool (e.g., Vulnerability Scanner or Automated Response Bot) published as an open-source repository.

benefits.title: Certification Readiness
benefits.description: Curriculum aligns with PCAP (Python) and CSSLP standards.

benefits.title: Industry Demand
benefits.description: High (Niche, focused on mature security teams)

benefits.title: Barrier to Entry
benefits.description: Very High (Requires proficiency in Software Engineering and Security)
